title: Print Alchemy
content:
This is a another design study for Print Alchemy which ended up being used   
as a promotional material.   
   
text is set in Toby Stokes's "Beetle"   
   
 ![PrintAlchemy promotional.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417052341im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/910.jpg)
author: designalchemy
